Buyer: Alright, I can do that. They really are lovely!
Seller: I agree! Thanks for working with me on this. Have a wonderful day, and I hope your apartment fills out nicely.

Buyer: Hello there. I'm sorry if I'm a little awkward. I never expected my dreams to come true this way. My very own antenna...

Buyer: You drive a hard bargain, bunny ears. But I respect a person who carries quality antennae. Hard to find anymore. Throw in a wire hanger to adjust it with from my lay z boy and you got a deal.
Seller: We're talking chrome-plated brass telescopic dipoles here pally... Ok... I can throw in a wire hanger but... it still has my dry cleaners name on it... give him a call, tell him I sent you, he'll hook you right up with all the starch you can handle.
